product_name: Eagle Creek RFID Deviate Travel Pack 60
long_description: Great for getting from transit to hotel, the versatile 60-liter Deviate is actually a 45-liter travel pack with a 15-liter clip-on daypack for carrying onto the plane or exploring at your destination.
short_description: Great for getting from transit to hotel, the versatile 60-liter Deviate is actually a 45-liter travel pack with a 15-liter clip-on daypack for carrying onto the plane or exploring at your destination.
